CAN-DRIVER-ADAPTATION
CAN-DRIVER

Longan Lab's Longan_CANFD library adaptation files. More...

Collaboration diagram for CAN-DRIVER-ADAPTATION:

Files

file  Arduino.h
 used to not provoke inclusion error in Longan labs library. delay() macro is redefined to call furi delay function.
 
file  flipper_spi_wrapper.cpp
 SPIclass method implementation.
 
file  SPI.h
 Bridge for porting Longan_CANFD to flipper zero without modifying code. A simple pull to the repo shall be OK.
 

Classes

class  SPISettings
 Unused structure passed to SPIClass::beginTransaction kept to ensure compatibility with Longan Labs library. More...
 
class  SPIClass
 Arduino's SPIclass porting. Used for communication with mcp2518. More...

Functions

 SPISettings::SPISettings (uint32_t freqHz, e_spi_endiannes_t endianness, e_spi_mode_t mode)
 Arduino's SPISettings constructor definition. It is an empty function kept to be compatible with Longan Lab's library.
 
void SPIClass::beginTransaction (SPISettings settings)
 Arduino's SPI.beginTransaction porting : It requests SPI ressource access ( furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external) by acquiring SPI related mutex through furi_hal_spi_acquire().
 
void SPIClass::endTransaction (void)
 Arduino's SPI.endTransaction porting : It frees SPI ressource access by releasing SPI related mutex ( furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external) through furi_hal_spi_release().
 
void SPIClass::begin (void)
 Arduino's SPI.begin porting: It is an empty function kept to be compatible with Longan Lab's library.
 
uint8_t SPIClass::transfer (uint8_t tx_data)
 Arduino's SPI.transfer porting. It sends (on MOSI) and receives (on MISO) one byte through furi_hal_spi_bus_trx().

Function Documentation

◆ begin()

void SPIClass::begin ( void  )

Arduino's SPI.begin porting: It is an empty function kept to be compatible with Longan Lab's library.

Definition at line 44 of file flipper_spi_wrapper.cpp.

◆ beginTransaction()

void SPIClass::beginTransaction ( SPISettings  settings)

Arduino's SPI.beginTransaction porting : It requests SPI ressource access ( furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external) by acquiring SPI related mutex through furi_hal_spi_acquire().

Parameters
[in]settings: This attribute is unused since SPI is already configured by FP0 firmware.

Definition at line 28 of file flipper_spi_wrapper.cpp.

◆ endTransaction()

void SPIClass::endTransaction ( void  )

Arduino's SPI.endTransaction porting : It frees SPI ressource access by releasing SPI related mutex ( furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external) through furi_hal_spi_release().

Definition at line 36 of file flipper_spi_wrapper.cpp.

◆ transfer()

uint8_t SPIClass::transfer ( uint8_t  tx_val)

Arduino's SPI.transfer porting. It sends (on MOSI) and receives (on MISO) one byte through furi_hal_spi_bus_trx().

Parameters
[in]tx_val: data byte to be sent.
Returns
returns data byte received.

Definition at line 18 of file flipper_spi_wrapper.cpp.
